# Wizardry III
## Overview
**Aura** strong (no school); **CL** 17th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 70,000 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This special ring comes in four kinds (*[[Wizardry I|ring of wizardry I]], [[Wizardry II|ring of wizardry II]], ring of wizardry III,* and *ring of wizardry IV*), all of them useful only to arcane spellcasters. The wearer’s arcane spells per day are doubled for one specific spell level. A *ring of wizardry III* doubles 3rd-level spells. Bonus spells from high ability scores or school specialization are not doubled.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]]*

**Cost** 35,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 484
